//%attributes = {"lang":"en"} comment added and reserved by 4D.
// 
// WS_GetStormanHelp
// http://192.168.3.2:19811/4DWSDL
// 
// Method source code automatically generated by the 4D SOAP wizard.
// ----------------------------------------------------------------

C_LONGINT($1)//Facilty Code
C_TEXT($2)//Business Name
C_TEXT($3)//Folder Delimiter
C_LONGINT($4)


WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vliFacilityCode";$1)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vtBusinessName";$2)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vtFolderDelimiter";$3)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vliFacilityVersion";$4)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vtaHelpDiskFolderList";WS_vtaHelpDiskFolderList)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vtaHelpDiskFileList";WS_vtaHelpDiskFileList)

WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_viaHelpDiskFileVersion";WS_viaHelpDiskFileVersion)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vdaHelpDiskFileLastModD";WS_vdaHelpDiskFileLastModD)
WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("WS_vliaHelpDiskFileLastModT";WS_vliaHelpDiskFileLastModT)

WEB SERVICE CALL("https://"+GetDNS ("SUV1")+":443/4DSOAP/";"StormanUsersV2#WS_GetStormanHelp";"WS_GetStormanHelp";"StormanUsersV2";Web Service dynamic)

If (OK=1)
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtaHelpFTPFileList;"WS_vtaHelpFTPFileList")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtaHelpFTPFileAction;"WS_vtaHelpFTPFileAction")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtaHelpFTPFolderList;"WS_vtaHelpFTPFolderList")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtaHelpFTPFolderAction;"WS_vtaHelpFTPFolderAction")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtHelpFTPFolder;"WS_vtHelpFTPFolder")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtHelpFTPHost;"WS_vtHelpFTPHost")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtHelpFTPUsername;"WS_vtHelpFTPUsername")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtHelpFTPPassword;"WS_vtHelpFTPPassword")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_viHelpFTPShowProgress;"WS_viHelpFTPShowProgress")
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT(WS_vtHelpMessage;"WS_vtHelpMessage";*)// Memory clean-up on the final return value."
End if
